articles.description: Kurt Thomas, the first U.S. male to win a gold medal at the Gymnastic World Championships, died Friday after suffering a stroke.
articles.content:
LOS ANGELES - Kurt Thomas, the first U.S. male to win a gold medal at the Gymnastic World Championships, died Friday after suffering a stroke. He was 64.
His stroke on May 24 was caused by a tear in… [+1337 chars]

articles.title: Why there’s confusion about when Nolan Ryan was selected in the first MLB Draft - The Athletic
articles.description: For years, the legendary pitcher has been cited as a 12th-round pick in 1965. However, he wasn't actually a 12th-round pick.
